body.name: SOULION R50 Bluetooth Computer Speakers, 3.5mm PC Sound Bar for Desktop Monitor, Wired USB Powered & Colorful RGB Lights with Switch Button, Stereo Surround Sound Soundbar PC Spearkers for Computer
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 32 mins
features: 【Bass Diaphragm】Soulion newly upgraded R50 soundbar is equipped with unique boosters and two independent bass diaphragms, providing rich treble and powerful bass to meet your audio needs for watching movies, listening to music and gaming.

【Aux and Bluetooth Mode】Two connection modes: USB powered with bluetooth and 3.5mm aux modes. The 3.5mm Bluetooth speaker is compatible with desktops, PCs, laptops, tablets, mobile phones, projectors and monitors. (Note: Bluetooth mode needs USB powered).

【4 Dynamic Light Modes】The R50 computer speakers have 4 dynamic LED lighting modes: gradient mode, breathing mode, rhythm mode and monochrome fixed mode, which you can customize according to your preference. The button on the right turns off the light.

【Long Press Clear Bluetooth Memory】The pc speaker uses a one-touch "M" key and adds a USB/Bluetooth mode prompt sound. Press and hold for three seconds to clear the Bluetooth memory, making it easier and more convenient to use.

【Portable & Slanted Design】The PC sound bar has a compact design, a 30-degree slightly tilted design, and a layer of breathable cloth on the outside to prevent dust from entering. The volume knob adjusts the volume, is comfortable to the touch, and fits for under the monitor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4 LED Ligthing Modes & 2 Connection Ways Strong Bass Bluetooth LED Lights Computer Speakers "M" Key: Mode selection(Aux Mode/Bluetooth Mode) Press and hold for 3 seconds to clear Bluetooth memory Light Key: Light on/off Mode swtich(Breath/Gradient/Rhythm/Monochrome Fixed) Rotate the Knob: Control volume +/-

2 Connection Methods USB Powered and 3.5mm Aux Mode - Plug & Play Plug into the USB port (such as a laptop, PC host, MAC pro/air and USB port audio adapter) for power and the plug 3.5mm jack for sound. Press the "M" key to select "Aux Mode". Bluetooth Mode - Plug & Play Plug in the USB port and press the "M" key to select “Bluetooth Mode”. Search "R50" on your smartphone/tablet and connect.

Mode Selection/Clear Bluetooth USB Powered and 3.5mm Aux Mode/Bluetooth ModePress and hold for 3 seconds to clear bluetooth memory Light - Switch/Mode Selection Light On/Off4 LED Lighting Modes: Breathing, Gradient, Rhythm, Monochrome fixed Rotate the Knob Turn Clockwise - Volume +Turn Counterclockwise - Volume - Unique Design Comfort Material30° TiltCompact Size for PC/Desktop

SOULION Computer Speakers Bluetooth Mode Memory Function 2-in-1 USB Plug Wired Mode USB Powered & 3.5mm Optional LED Effects Lighting Effects Auto Conversion White Color Grey Bluetooth Mode Memory Function 2-in-1 USB Plug Wired Mode 2-in-1 USB Plug Optional LED Effects Lighting Effects Optional LED Effects White Color Black

How to connect to computer/laptop? Plug in the USB connector and plug in the 3.5mm aux jact, hold down the "M" key to select "Aux Mode". How do I disconnect another person's Bluetooth connection? 1.Let the first person to connect to Bluetooth click on the mobile phone to disconnect the R50 Bluetooth connection. 2. Press and hold the M button for 3 seconds to clear the Bluetooth memory function How to connect my mobile phone/tablet? Plug in the USB connector and press the "M" key to select “Bluetooth Mode”. Search "R50" on your smartphone/tablet and connect. How long is the external 3.5mm cable? 1.5m.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Low budget speaker
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Let me preface this by saying I got this speaker for less than $30. I’ve waited 2 weeks of daily use of the speaker to write this review to get a good feel for it.And let me tell you… for the price this thing isn’t bad at all. Now it doesn’t have a deep bass that you’ll find with the more expensive brands, but the sound quality is there. I was surprised with how loud and crisp the speaker got.It’s plug and play so you don’t need to worry about setting anything up. You can connect it via Bluetooth or aux input. You do need a usb power adapter if you want to plug it into an outlet though because there isn’t one included but that wasn’t a big deal for me because I have a ton of them already.One thing that I really liked about it was the volume knob. I just prefer having a knob to control my volume because it’s easier. It’s also really lightweight so I brought this thing all around the house with me. I actually had it plugged into one of my cheap power banks and it didn’t drain the battery for over 24 hours so it also didn’t consume a lot of power.The RBG lighting is always nice, I have RBG lighting all over my room so it fit in perfectly with my desk setup.A few things I wish were different— I wish it came in white because black isn’t really my vibe, but it’ll be fine.Overall, if you’re in the market for a Bluetooth speaker but not trying to spend an arm and a leg, i would get this one. Best budget friendly speaker!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great affordable soundbar!
reviews.reviewText: This soundbar has been a mainstay in my setup for the past 3 months. As an affordable sound bar it works great, looks great, sounds great. I really like the look of the charcoal fabric on the exterior. The rest of the exterior casing is plastic but doesn’t feel cheap. The volume dial spins very smoothly too and the RGB is tasteful done. My only gripe is where the power cord comes out of the body. It’s toward the top of the case so it sticks up like an Ariana Grande ponytail. I just wish this was located in a more discreet location. Other than that, I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap Speaker, all I wanted
reviews.reviewText: It's cheap. The sound quality is mediocre, but I hope anyone buying this isn't expecting good sound from a $20 speaker. Build quality and everything is about where you'd expect it to be, not bad. I don't use the RGB, but I did test it and it works. Not as many options as you'd get from something like an RGB controller for your PC parts, but again, it's cheap and there's one button to set the RGB. It makes it simple.The sound bar itself is probably longer than it should be or needs to be, I'm assuming to give the full sound bar aesthetic, but it works well enough in my case even having to fit between two monitors. If it were a little longer or shorter I could have it sit slightly forward but with how my monitors happen to be spaced, any further forward and it wants to tip backward. I found that sound isn't really affected in my case by pushing it back a couple inches.I expected the cables to be longer, but in my case I still have a foot or so of slack. I was just a little surprised to open the package and see what looks like 1 meter/3 feet of cords.I bought this speaker for my office, just to replace an old broken pair. One was dead, one worked but volume on certain videos was almost completely inaudible. This thing actually gets pretty loud. I didn't expect half of the volume I got from it. Again, even at quiet volumes, the sound quality is not good, but I've definitely heard worse. I'd buy it again if I had a use for it, unless it dies on me prematurely, and in that case I'll update this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a very nice speaker! It works very well and is very easy to set up and use! Looks rlly cute in my setup Also! I love the lights on the side they are so pretty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars System sounds inaudible
reviews.reviewText: At first I was really impressed with the sound quality of this sound bar, music, videos, etc, all had really good sound, but then I noticed that the system sounds on my computer were completely inaudible. Not a volume setting or mixer setting; the system sounds simply can't be heard even though everything is good. I bought a Nylavee soundbar and the sound quality, not just of the system sounds, but of all audio in general is vastly superior. The Nylavee has four speakers and two passive diaghrams, instead of just two speakers and two passive diaphragms in the Soulion R50. You get far suplerative bass, and the sound separation, which is all but non-existant with the Soulion R50, is excellent. it costs me roughly $35 more to get the Nylavee, but the vastly superior sound makes it well worth the price. I gave the Soulion away to someone who needed a speaker for their computer, and I am far happier, now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: In terms of USB/AUX speakers you can get online, this one has great sound and looks pretty decent. For under 100 or so dollars, I feel this is going to have a pretty similar sound quality. Bass is decent, it has a decent volume and it sounds clean, not muddy or tinny as some cheap speakers do. The leds aren’t overpowering and I’ve left them on when I go to bed, no problem. Overall a very very good value, considering the name brand speakers of similar quality are usually around ten times the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great sound and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: Great sound bar! The sound bar is connected to my desktop PC. I need it for work and streaming movies from my desktop computer, sometimes. The colors on the side you can adjust with an on/off push button or turn off completely. I find them distracting so I am glad I can turn them off, just not my thing. The sound is controlled by a dial. The entire thing is quite simple and inexpensive 16Wx2.5D,2.75D. It is a little long for my space but it is better than having two separate computer speakers. I am happy with this purchase and super glad it arrived quickly since my work speakers just died.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars bad sound quality and not loud
reviews.reviewText: its a very good looking sound bar, but the sound quality is not very good at all. And it doesn't get loud.

Die Soundqualität ist gerade so ok aber nicht zu vergleichen mit der Bose Sound Link Mini. Allerdings ist der Soulion Lautsprecher deutlich günstiger als der Bose Sound Link Mini, von dem her ist Preis/Leistung in Ordnung.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: SOULION R50 PC Speakers - A Symphony of Sound and Light!
reviews.reviewText: The SOULION R50 PC Speakers have transformed my desktop into a multimedia haven, providing an audio and visual experience that goes beyond expectations. As someone who appreciates both crisp sound and aesthetics, these speakers have become an essential part of my setup.The standout feature is undoubtedly the fusion of colorful lights and stereo surround sound. The visual impact of the lights adds a dynamic and vibrant element to my workspace. It's not just about the audio; it's a visual symphony that enhances the overall ambiance. The switch button for the lights is a thoughtful touch, allowing me to tailor the visual experience to my mood.In terms of sound quality, the R50 delivers impressive stereo surround sound. The clarity and depth of the audio are remarkable, creating an immersive experience whether I'm gaming, watching movies, or listening to music. The speakers strike an excellent balance, ensuring that both highs and lows are well-represented.The dual connectivity options, Bluetooth and 3.5mm, provide flexibility for various devices. Whether I'm connecting wirelessly from my phone or using the 3.5mm jack for my desktop, the R50 seamlessly integrates with my devices. The USB-powered feature ensures that I don't need an additional power source, keeping my setup clean and clutter-free.The compact design of the soundbar is a practical choice. It fits neatly on my desk without taking up much space, yet it delivers a powerful audio punch. The build quality feels robust, and the controls are conveniently placed for easy access.Setting up the R50 is a breeze. The Bluetooth pairing is straightforward, and the 3.5mm connection ensures compatibility with a wide range of devices. The user-friendly design means that you can enjoy high-quality sound without spending precious time on installation.The R50's compatibility extends beyond just PCs. I've used it with my laptop and even connected it to my TV for a more immersive home theater experience. The versatility of these speakers makes them a valuable addition to any entertainment setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Now this is exactly what I was looking for!This speaker has exceeded expectations and then some.Some cheaper speakers like this, they sound very tinny but this speaker delivers exceptional sound quality with clear highs, robust mids, and deep bass. The audio is well-balanced, providing an immersive experience for various activities, from gaming to music. The speakers are also aesthetically pleasing, making them a great addition to any setup. Overall, a solid choice for those seeking impressive audio performance from their computer speakers, especially at this price point!It connects via Aux or Bluetooth, making it perfect to play music from your phone or plugged into your PC. The extra bonus of subtle RGB on the sides, which are customisable with 4 different modes is something else I love.I originally had a 5.1 surround sound in the set up this was in, but I honestly do not miss it now I have this. The way the speaker is angled, you still get the immersive sound when playing games that require you to have audio around you.I would highly recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a computer speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Sounds decent for most needs... but if you want bass.. Mmm...
reviews.reviewText: Needed a better sound than the sqeaky speakers that the monitor pumps out for my work work from home setup for the weekends. This is cheap and it works just fine and obviously the RGB gives me more FPS! :)Seriously if you need a quick cheap upgrade than monitor speakers this works. But if you want the rumble and you are a BASS junky (like me) this will not float your boat. Just saying...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good sized sound bar that fits snuggly under my monitor shelf, pairs/connects quickly with good sound quality
